#summary Installation Instructions

Dependencies:
 Software:
  make (for installation only)<br/>
  perl

 Perl Modules:
  Getopt::Long<br/>
  IO::Handle<br/>
  Nmap::Parser<br/>
  Pod::Usage<br/>

To install this software into the default location (/usr/local) do the
following:

 gzip -dc xndiff-0.1.tgz | tar -xof -<br/>
 cd xndiff-0.1<br/>
 perl Makefile.PL<br/>
 make'<br/>
 make install

To install in an alternative location specify a prefix for where the software
is to be installed.  For example, this set of commands will install the
software in a directory called $HOME/xndiff:

 gzip -dc xndiff-0.1.tgz | tar -xof -<br/>
 cd xndiff-0.1<br/>
 perl Makefile.PL PREFIX=$HOME/xndiff<br/>
 make<br/>
 make install

If you had specified the alternative prefix (as above) then the following
files would be installed:

 $HOME/xndiff/lib/perl/5.8/perllocal.pod<br/>
 $HOME/xndiff/lib/perl/5.8.8/auto/xndiff/.packlist<br/>
 $HOME/xndiff/man/man1/xndiff.1p<br/>
 $HOME/xndiff/bin/xndiff
